Package gamelogic.gamestate

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdaptiveDifficulty
    The class that keeps track of adaptive difficulty for a single user.
    AdaptiveDifficultyData
    The class that keeps track of some data that is usefull for adaptive difficulty.
    CheatDetector
    The system checking if a player is cheating.
    GameState
    An object to store the game state.
    HintSystem
    The system generating the hints.
    ProblemSelector
    The system for selecting a random problem from the problem repo
    ProblemState
    An object to store the state of the problems.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    AdaptiveDifficulty.FeatureRequirement
    The optionality options of a feature.
